name.value: SelfMeasurements - XIS Server - Test Scenario 7.X - Serve bodyweight Observation resources

description.value: Scenario 7.X - Serve all bodyweight Observation resources
Serve all bodyweight Observation resources
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: selfmeasurements-kwalificatie1)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation resource that contains valueQuantity.value = '81'
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Resource.id for Observation 1
Observation 1 contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-BodyWeight'
Observation 1 contains .identifier with .system and .value
Observation 1 contains .status 'final'
Observation 1 contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-category' and .code 'vital-signs' and .display)
Observation 1 contains .code with .coding with .system 'http://loinc.org' and .code '29463-7' and .display)
Observation 1 contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Observation 1 contains .effectiveDateTime with a value that equals T-date - 22 days
Observation 1 contains .performer with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Observation 1 contains .valueQuantity with .value '81' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code 'kg'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${selfmeasurements-kwalificatie1-id}').value.where(value = 81 and unit.exists() and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = 'kg').exists()

description.value: Observation 1 contains .component with specific contents. This asserts checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${selfmeasurements-kwalificatie1-id}').component.where(code.where(coding.where(system = 'http://loinc.org' and code = '8352-7' and display.exists())).exists() and value.where(coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.4.8.1' and code = 'MINIMAL' and display.exists())).exists()).exists()

description.value: Observation 1 contains .component.code with .coding with .system 'http://loinc.org' and .code '8352-7' and .display). This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-10 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Observation 1 contains .component.valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.4.8.1' and .code 'MINIMAL' and .display). This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-10 checks if all children are present in the same parent
